content: A reason for a change in status of an EpisodeOfCare might be helpful.
Reason for change is generally captured in Provenance for most resources. Some resources might capture status reason but episode of care seems an unusual place for that.

I would have thought provenance would be a weird place to expect to find status change reasons. Can you log a tracker item for discussion in PA Peter? (and if you think this should be coded - a suggested example binding?)
